description.string_value: China is marking the 84th anniversary of the 1937 Nanking Massacre, in which it says 300,000 civilians and disarmed soldiers were killed by Japanese in and around the former Chinese capital

1470560154512809985.full_text: #NanjingMassacre commenced Dec 13, 1937 when the Imperial Japanese Army took control of then-capital, Nanjing. 300,000 mostly civilians were killed within the span of a month. For reference, that is almost fully half the population of Seattle.
